misinfocon.title: MisInfoCon Article
misinfocon.text: I wrote an article on the background of my project for MisInfoCon

mozfest.title: Viblio at Mozfest
mozfest.text: I was invited to present my work on Viblio under the WikiUX Grant at Mozilla Festival with the Credibilty Coalition

urs-21.title: Undergraduate Research Symposium 2021
urs-21.text: I presented my work on Viblio so far with in the Usability group at the 2021 URS.
